label: A13B5_hP18_164_a2c4d_b2d-001
title: Li$_{13}$Sn$_{5}$ Structure
comments: We have made two corrections to the data given in (Frank, 1975): \begin{itemize} \item They do not give any information on the position of atom Li(5) (our Li-III) in Table I.  Figure 1 places it on a (2c) site.  We used the distance data in Table II to find the value of $z_{3}$. \item They place atom Li(6) (our Li-IV) on a (2d) site.  The figure shows it is on a (2c) site.  The coordinate given is consistent with the distances found in the aforementioned table. \end{itemize}
